name: Ranch Chicken Quesadillas
description: Score big on game day with these chicken quesadillas. The kick of ranch is a surefire way to score points with your fellow fans. And the best part? It's ready in 20 min.
preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F.  Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Place chicken in Multipurpose Steamer. Sprinkle with 2 tsp seasoning. Cover; microwave on high 7 min.
Meanwhile, in bowl, stir together mayonnaise, and remaining 1 tbsp dip mix.
Once chicken is cooked, let rest 2 min then uncover. Discard liquid in steamer. Using 2 forks, shred chicken.
Arrange tortillas on pan. Spread dip on half of each tortilla. Top with shredded chicken, bell pepper, and cheese. Fold tortillas over filling.
Bake for 5–7 min or until cheese melts and tortillas are light golden.
Cut tortillas into wedges and serve.

products.name: Creamy Ranch Dip Mix
summary: Go beyond your classic ranch dressing and create spreads, dips, or seasonings with this versatile blend!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
